40.title_api: Many Egyptian Christians feel left out of World Cup

(AP Photo/Amr Nabil)

41.title_api: Salah, Neymar, Messi, messy, messy: World Cup stars stifled
41.caption_api: Argentina’s Lionel Messi reacts after the third goal by Croatia during a Group D match against Croatia at the 2018 soccer World Cup in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia, on Thursday. Croatia won, 3-0.
41.desc_api: With nagging injuries, heavy marking from opponents and some simply uninspired play, the top stars of the 2018 World Cup have struggled to deliver on the impossible expectations they carried into the soccer tournament, with one prominent Portuguese exception.
